channel.title: Help with adding objects and fixing glory please ;D
channel.description:
Ok so i need help with two things..
adding objects such as ancient alter to an area...
and also..
i want to make it so an amulet of glory can teleport people to karomaja.
i really dont care about it taking away charges or if it can tele any where else.
thanks for any feedback/help :}
( im new to this forum site so if its in wrong section ill delete and repost)
